attributes.action: Grant sovereignty of power to local Conservation Officers in matters regarding Conservation Area Planning policies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is heartbreaking to see lumps of local heritage being consigned to rubbish skips and precious green spaces being built over and disappearing for ever.

With the proliferation of development countrywide, there is a great need to keep Conservation Areas extra special and in the hands of sensitive Conservation Officers.
